workshop.title: ODI on JCS Install and Config Notes from Martha

labs.title: Lab 1: Introduction
labs.description: Create and access an Autonomous Database Cloud Service

labs.title: Lab 2: Review Query Performance
labs.description: Run sample queries against a 100 million row current data set and a six billion row historic data set

labs.title: Lab 3: Machine Learning
labs.description: Work with an Apache Zepplin notebook and create a Machine Learning model to predict customer good credit

labs.title: Lab 4: Create Data Visualizations
labs.description: Create data visualizations with Oracle Analytics Cloud to review sales performance and better understand the factors that affect good credit
